      • getPixel

        public Pixel getPixel(int x,
                      int y)
               throws UnknownPixelException
        gets pixel at coord (x,y) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
        Specified by:
        getPixel in interface ImageInterface
        Parameters:
        x - the horizontal coordinate
        y - the vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        pixel at coord x,y of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
        Throws:
        UnknownPixelException - if pixel of coord (x,y) does not exist

      • initImagePGM

        public static Image initImagePGM(java.lang.String fileName)
        Reads a PGM image from file. It is assumed that file respects the following PGM file syntax:
        • first line with string "P2"
        • second line : a comment
        • one int for width w, one int for heighth
        • one int for max gray level (not used here, we consider this level to be 255 in our images)
        • w x h integers between 0 and max (for us max=255) for each pixel
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the image file in PGM format
        Returns:
        the image built from the file
